title: How did I not get an S or S-
body: Hello everyone, please look at my match history and tell me how to get an S with Lucian.

replies.body:
In addition to Yaiamone's response, I definitely encourage you to make a post in the [Gameplay & Strategy](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy) sub-board to ask the community for their tips and tricks for Lucian!

Some of the easiest things to focus on with any non-support champion that apply to general mechanics are properly warding and last hitting/farming minions. (:

There isn't a set criteria you need to achieve.

In the end, the grade you receive is based on the[ **same champ** in the **same role**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/features/champion-mastery) compared to everyone else on the server. You have to be in the top x% of players playing whichever champion in whichever role (they treat annie mid and annie support differently for example). Lucian is pretty popular champion

In this particular case I can definitely see your CS being your biggest downfall, with your games nearing an hour in length yet you having barely passed 200 CS. Work on getting that number to around 300+ in the same time frame as well as keeping your warding and team participation up and you should get an S grade.
